title: Nerf Mundo - Broken Health Issue.
body:
Mundo has like never ending HP and never ending mana. BROKEN unfair.. He has like 6 hp bars compared to cait's 1500 hp. 

Any mundo can just build warmogs, spirt visage, thornmail and whatever other health regain items and he doesn't die.

Mundos hp regain need a cap, rioto should decide on what is the maxium health regain champions can obtain... Perhaps only 6,000 maximum... After all tanks still do damage too, its not like they are just giant walls that dont attack back..

Additionally the maximum hp should be a fixed amount for all champions... I think its up to rioto to decide how much HP a champion can possibly have... 

A champion shouldn't have like 10,000 HP and regain all of it in like 2-10 seconds... Mundo's regain should only be a certain amount gained every few seconds... That way Mundo cant stand under 2 towers and take damage from 5 people at the same time without dying...
